short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See how much time you spend on each website and set limits

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Simple Dashboard
- Set limits for each host
- Powerful & flexible rules
- Import & Export data
- 100% Open Source & Local
- Set retention policy that deletes all logs older than a user specified number of days.
